txt.en: 'So many died...at least the brigands are gone for good now.'
'I don't know where I can go now. People here say they'll rebuild, but....'
'It's going to smell of smoke and ash for weeks!'
'I used to think I knew this place...now I don't know.'
'The others, they were sleeping when the brigands came...they never had a chance.'
'I guess Brackenbrook's son did well by the town.'
